Text: Thanks for posting some first motos.  I usually download from slicknick610, but he only gets the stuff from Speed, so I've been missing the first motos.  New format for TV is a little weird.  Thanks again.

I record these videos with iShowU HD. It's just a soft to record your computer screen, i think it's dedicated for eLearning, but works perfectly for motocross.
Thanks.
For the previous rounds, I just don't have the time to record them, as the races are available on allisport.com, I focus on FIM championship.
